name: [LD49] Unstable Dissonance
description:
Dissonance - If you mix the wrong keys, everything becomes Unstable

Keys W/S / Mouse Orbit

Game Created by Dominique McDonell (Sound Design) and Daniel Rosser (Games Programming, Game Design, Sound) Audio was generated in Ableton for the jam All Code for Game Design coded in the jam Animations all coded in DoTween / custom lerps

We generated all the sounds, blending all musical keys. Aim of the game is to match musical keys in

Unity Engine 2021.1.23 External Assets: Shapes FX, Space Toolkit
